Subject: Real Life Tragic News
Message-ID: <95ch7j+qu3s@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 771
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "Burrter the Saiyan-jin" <americano37@...>

Hello. My name is David Smith, older brother to Michael Smith, or who 
you know as minime_316@.... Michael's been having problems 
with his life since he left your group, and finally had to find away 
to come to terms with himself. I'm sad to say that about 2 weeks ago 
my brother Michael took his own life. He mentioned in his note to 
tell all of you how much you meant to him, and to atleast make him 
feel like he belonged to something for awhile. Michael wished The 
Council well, and for his friends Kingler, Logo Alloran and Soulstice 
to remember him. Not weep for him, but remember him. He's found 
peace, and I'm sure wherever he is, he's happy. He just wanted you 
all to know that he thought the time he speant with you was very 
special. Thank You.
